Preheat the oven to 200Â°C. Coat two pie plates with olive oil.
Combine the flour, yeast, baking powder, salt, turmeric, and pepper in a large bowl. Stir in the spinach and garlic, then whisk in the water and olive oil.

Pour in the batter and bake for 45 minutes, or until cooked through and a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Remove from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes (Keeps for up to 3 days in the fridge).
